events.name: Meeting between Chinese and Australian Foreign Ministers
events.wd_label: Meeting between Chinese and Australian Foreign Ministers
events.wd_description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi urged Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong to view China as a partner rather than an opponent, aiming to improve bilateral relations.
events.description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi urged Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong to view China as a partner rather than an opponent, aiming to improve bilateral relations.

events.name: Wang Yi's statement
events.wd_description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi urged Australia to accumulate "positive energy" and improve ties by viewing China as a partner rather than an opponent.
events.description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi urged Australia to accumulate "positive energy" and improve ties by viewing China as a partner rather than an opponent.

events.name: Penny Wong's response
events.wd_description: Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong acknowledged the meeting as a first step toward stabilizing relations but noted that trade blockages would take time to be removed.
events.description: Australian Foreign Minister Penny Wong acknowledged the meeting as a first step toward stabilizing relations but noted that trade blockages would take time to be removed.

events.name: meeting discussion
events.wd_description: During the meeting, Wang Yi emphasized that China was engaging in "equal exchange and cooperation" based on the needs of sovereign island nations.
events.description: During the meeting, Wang Yi emphasized that China was engaging in "equal exchange and cooperation" based on the needs of sovereign island nations.

events.name: Severe Flooding in Sydney
events.wd_description: Thousands of people in low-lying areas around Sydney were forced to evacuate due to the third severe flooding storm since March, with significant rainfall and river breaches.
events.description: Thousands of people in low-lying areas around Sydney were forced to evacuate due to the third severe flooding storm since March, with significant rainfall and river breaches.

events.name: Flooding Storm
events.wd_description: The storm caused the Hawkesbury-Nepean River to breach flood levels and the Warragamba Dam to spill earlier than expected.
events.description: The storm caused the Hawkesbury-Nepean River to breach flood levels and the Warragamba Dam to spill earlier than expected.

events.name: Emergency Response
events.wd_description: The State Emergency Service responded to over 1,400 help requests and conducted 29 water rescues within 24 hours due to the flooding.
events.description: The State Emergency Service responded to over 1,400 help requests and conducted 29 water rescues within 24 hours due to the flooding.

events.name: Continued Storm Activity
events.wd_description: The storm is expected to persist until Tuesday, bringing more heavy rain, damaging winds, and shoreline erosion.
events.description: The storm is expected to persist until Tuesday, bringing more heavy rain, damaging winds, and shoreline erosion.

events.name: Ukraine's long-range rocket strike on Russian forces
events.wd_label: Ukraine's long-range rocket strike on Russian forces
events.wd_description: Ukraine confirmed a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces in southern Ukraine, with plans for a counter-offensive using hundreds of thousands of troops.
events.description: Ukraine confirmed a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces in southern Ukraine, with plans for a counter-offensive using hundreds of thousands of troops.

events.name: Ukrainian strike
events.wd_description: Ukraine carried out a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces and military equipment in southern Ukraine.
events.description: Ukraine carried out a long-range rocket strike against Russian forces and military equipment in southern Ukraine.

events.name: Russian-installed authorities' report
events.wd_description: Russian-installed authorities reported that the attack resulted in at least seven deaths and around 70 injuries, claiming civilians and civilian infrastructure were hit.
events.description: Russian-installed authorities reported that the attack resulted in at least seven deaths and around 70 injuries, claiming civilians and civilian infrastructure were hit.

events.name: Ukraine's military statement
events.wd_description: Ukraine's southern military command reported that the strike resulted in the loss of 52 Russian personnel, a Msta-B howitzer, a mortar, seven vehicles, and an ammunition depot in Nova Kakhovka.
events.description: Ukraine's southern military command reported that the strike resulted in the loss of 52 Russian personnel, a Msta-B howitzer, a mortar, seven vehicles, and an ammunition depot in Nova Kakhovka.

events.name: CATL and FlexGen Partnership for Energy Storage
events.wd_label: CATL and FlexGen Partnership for Energy Storage
events.wd_description: On September 21, CATL announced a partnership with FlexGen to supply 10GWh of advanced energy storage products over three years.
events.description: On September 21, CATL announced a partnership with FlexGen to supply 10GWh of advanced energy storage products over three years.

events.name: Supply Agreement Announcement
events.wd_description: CATL and FlexGen signed a partnership agreement for CATL to supply 10GWh of energy storage products over three years.
events.description: CATL and FlexGen signed a partnership agreement for CATL to supply 10GWh of energy storage products over three years.

events.name: Product Details
events.wd_description: CATL will supply FlexGen with containerized liquid-cooled energy storage products, EnerC, which feature IP55 protection and C5 anti-corrosion ratings, suitable for extreme weather and designed for 20 years of reliable operation.
events.description: CATL will supply FlexGen with containerized liquid-cooled energy storage products, EnerC, which feature IP55 protection and C5 anti-corrosion ratings, suitable for extreme weather and designed for 20 years of reliable operation.

events.name: FlexGen's Role
events.wd_description: FlexGen will integrate CATL's energy storage systems with its HybridOS™ energy management platform to provide advanced and reliable energy solutions for utilities, competitive power markets, and municipal projects across North America.
events.description: FlexGen will integrate CATL's energy storage systems with its HybridOS™ energy management platform to provide advanced and reliable energy solutions for utilities, competitive power markets, and municipal projects across North America.

events.name: Market Impact
events.wd_description: This partnership expands CATL's service network in North America and accelerates the development of energy storage projects, contributing to the energy transition and enhancing grid resilience.
events.description: This partnership expands CATL's service network in North America and accelerates the development of energy storage projects, contributing to the energy transition and enhancing grid resilience.

events.name: t: Previous Collaboration
events.wd_description: CATL and FlexGen have collaborated on energy storage projects totaling over 2.5GWh, with FlexGen recently designated as an authorized service provider for CATL's battery storage systems.
events.description: CATL and FlexGen have collaborated on energy storage projects totaling over 2.5GWh, with FlexGen recently designated as an authorized service provider for CATL's battery storage systems.

events.name: t: Industry Prospects
events.wd_description: The energy storage industry holds vast potential for promoting energy transition and improving grid resilience, with CATL playing a leading role in global energy storage innovation.
events.description: The energy storage industry holds vast potential for promoting energy transition and improving grid resilience, with CATL playing a leading role in global energy storage innovation.
